sentence.Network_en: As I sit in a shadowy corner, I observe a slow and gradual elongation of his mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐在一个暗角落里我观察到他的嘴慢慢而逐渐地伸长.

sentence.Network_en: Both flange and web exhibited satisfactory elongation characteristics ( i . e . 28 % ).
sentence.Network_cn: 翼缘和腹板都有令人满意的延伸率 ( 即28% ).

sentence.Network_en: This should not be confused with measurements of shoot elongation.
sentence.Network_cn: 该情况不应与枝梢延伸测定混为一谈.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin elongatio(n-), from elongare 'place at a distance' (see elongate)

means.word_mean: 2. an addition to the length of something
